channel.title: Hyperion Help?
channel.description:
Am getting this....
[code=java]Dec 2, 2010 10:55:52 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting hyperion... Dec 2, 2010 10:55:53 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Dec 2, 2010 10:55:53 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Dec 2, 2010 10:55:53 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Dec 2, 2010 10:55:53 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Dec 2, 2010 10:55:53 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Dec 2, 2010 10:55:53 AM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Dec 2, 2010 10:55:53 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Dec 2, 2010 10:55:55 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Dec 2, 2010 10:55:55 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Dec 2, 2010 10:55:55 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14974 object definitions. Dec 2, 2010 10:55:55 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Dec 2, 2010 10:55:56 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 1376518 objects. Dec 2, 2010 10:55:56 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Dec 2, 2010 10:56:00 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 11525 definitions Dec 2, 2010 10:56:01 AM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Access is denied) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Access is denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java:107) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$4.call(World.java:139) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Anyone have npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml ? If so please upload it and post me link.
Thanks in Advanced!

item.title: Hyperion Help?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:3, topic:371437”]java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Access is denied)

Access is denied… If you’re on Vista, and possibly Windows 7, you’ll have to disable UAC, or run it as an administrator.

What base is this? I know the blank Hyperion doesn’t hard code paths like that, and it sure as hell doesn’t use “EPICSHIT1337” in file names.[/quote]

Looking at it, he has obviously tried adding a NPC Definitions.xml, as Hyperion only has Item Definition.xml.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Help?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Access is denied)

Access is denied… If you’re on Vista, and possibly Windows 7, you’ll have to disable UAC, or run it as an administrator.

What base is this? I know the blank Hyperion doesn’t hard code paths like that, and it sure as hell doesn’t use “EPICSHIT1337” in file names.

Read full topic
